bug.author: alalek
bug.description:
All Python samples must have implementation under: <denchmark-code>if __name__ == '__main__': </denchmark-code>
condition. demo.py loads selected module to collect "doc" text. Module should not run anything in this mode. relates <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/12827>#12827</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/13267>#13267</denchmark-link>
/cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hrnr>@hrnr</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/LaurentBerger>@LaurentBerger</denchmark-link>
